name: Whitehawk Ranch Golf Course
description: Premier Sierra layout near Graeagle—pine-lined fairways and mountain views, ideal for golf groups and corporate outings.

faqs.question: What’s included in Whitehawk Ranch golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Whitehawk Ranch, carts, and concierge planning. Optional transportation, dining, and multi-course itineraries.

faqs.question: How much do Whitehawk Ranch packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $249–$449 per golfer depending on season, lodging selection, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you handle corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—tee-time blocks, room blocks, tournament setup, and logistics for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Whitehawk Ranch Golf Course | Graeagle Golf Groups & Stay and Play
meta.description: Plan Whitehawk Ranch near Graeagle with golf groups, tee times, and stay-and-play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and leisure trips. Rated 4.6/5 (287).
